results.youtubeTitle: Galaxy Book: How to use AI Select | Samsung
results.groundTruth:
This is the official video guide on how to use AI Select on Galaxy Book. Search effortlessly without interrupting your flow‚Äîdrag it, draw it, and find it! üîç AI Select is here to simplify internet searches for you‚Äîfrom looking up text to scanning QR codes, get on board with AI Select ‚ú® Explore the endless world of Galaxy AI as more exciting features await you. 00:00 Intro

01:03 Search text with AI Select

Follow these simple steps to use AI Select:
Step 1: Launch 'AI Select' from the search bar.
Step 2: Drag and draw around the object to select the image, text, or QR code you want to search.
Step 3: Results appear immediately on the right side of the screen.
Step 4: Proceed with the action you want, such as opening a link, translating, or checking related information.
Step 5: Save or share the search results for convenient use.

Q: What content and features are supported?
A: It supports selecting areas in various content such as images, videos, and text, then editing, saving, sharing, and extracting text.

Q: Is text extraction or translation also possible?
A: Yes. You can extract the selected text to copy or share it, and you can also use translation or writing assist features.

#GalaxyAI #GalaxyBook5Pro 360 #GalaxyBook5Pro #GalaxyBook5 #Samsung

results.youtubeTitle: How to use Storage Share across Galaxy devices | Samsung
results.groundTruth:
This is the official video guide on how to use Storage Share across Galaxy devices. Storage Share lets you wirelessly transfer files üóÇÔ∏è across your Galaxy devices without the need for external drives or tangled cables. Simply drag and drop files between devices and it's done! Learn more: http://smsng.co/GalaxyBook5_Storage-S...

00:00 Intro
00:11 Set things up first
00:42 Connect between Galaxy devices
01:30 Explore various uses

Follow these simple steps to use Storage Share:
Step 1: Sign in to the same Samsung Account on Galaxy Book and smartphone, then turn on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on both devices.
Step 2: On Galaxy Book, open 'Samsung Settings' ‚Üí 'Connected devices' ‚Üí turn on 'Storage Share'.
Step 3: Open 'File Explorer', select your phone from the left menu, then tap 'Allow' on the phone to connect.
Step 4: Now open your phone‚Äôs folders and files directly from Galaxy Book, and drag and drop to transfer freely between both devices.

Q: Does it take up storage space?
A: No. Storage Share pulls files directly from your phone, so no additional space is used.
Q: Can I use Storage Share on a TV as well?
A: Yes. On 2025 Samsung Smart TVs, turning on Storage Share lets you view files from your phone or tablet right on the TV.

#GalaxyAI #GalaxyBook5Pro 360 #GalaxyBook5 #Samsung

results.youtubeTitle: How to use Running Coach | Galaxy Watch8 Series | Samsung
results.groundTruth:
This is the official video guide üìù on how to check your running level and train step by step with Running Coach on Galaxy Watch8 Series. Where does your running ability stand right now? You can find out through Running Coach on Galaxy Watch8 Series. Start with a simple test that measures your running level from 1 to 10, then follow a 3 to 5 week training plan tailored to your results. Running Coach helps you train at your own pace and chart your own path of progress. Learn more: http://smsng.co/Watch8_Running-Coach_yt

00:00 Intro
00:15 Connect
00:24 Survey
00:53 Running test
01:48 Training plan
02:15 Daily insights 
02:28 Level up test

Follow these simple steps to use Running Coach on Galaxy Watch8 Series:
Step 1: Tap ‚ÄòFind your level‚Äô on your Galaxy Watch8 Series to start Running Coach.
Step 2: Take the Running Level Test to assess your current running ability.
Step 3: Receive a level from 1 to 10 and get a 3 to 5 week training plan.
Step 4: Follow the daily training guide and receive running insights during each workout.
Step 5: Track your progress and challenge yourself to reach the next level.

Q: What kind of workout plan does Running Coach offer?
A: Running Coach provides a structured 3 to 5 week plan that's customized to your fitness level. It provides real-time audio guidance from your watch to notify you about your pace, distance and progress toward your goal regardless whether you're a beginner or an experienced runner.
Q. Will my training be saved even if I don't hit my goal? And is it okay to do multiple sessions in a day?
A: Yes, all your Running Coach training sessions are saved, even if you don‚Äôt meet your goal. This data can help adjust future training plans. However, we recommend completing only one session per day since multiple sessions may lead to excessive training load.
Q. Can I use Running Coach on a treadmill?
A: Running Coach is only available in outdoor environments where GPS signals are received. This is because the training program relies on real-time location data to calculate pace, distance and speed. Indoor environments do not provide a GPS signal, which can affect the accuracy of training data.
Q: What is RPE?
A: RPE stands for Rating of Perceived Exertion. It is an index that indicates the intensity you felt during the workout, from a scale of 1 to 10. Unlike objective stats like heart rate or speed, RPE reflects your condition subjectively. 

#GalaxyAI #GalaxyWatch8 #Samsung

results.groundTruth: This is the official video guide on how to apply Anti-reflecting Film on Galaxy S25 FE. Want to easily apply the film yourself? Learn more: http://smsng.co/S25FE_Film_How-to_yt 00:00 Intro 00:13 What's in the box 00:16 Set up 00:34 Apply the Anti-reflecting Film 01:33 Finish up Follow the steps below, and you'll be able to apply the Anti-reflecting Film quickly and easily! ü§ì Step 1: Attach the applicator to your Galaxy S25 FE. Step 2: Clean the screen with microfiber cleaner and dust removal sticker. Step 3: Align the Anti-reflecting Film with the Galaxy S25 FE screen and apply one half. Step 4: Rotate your Galaxy S25 FE and apply the remaining half of the film. Step 5: Finish by smoothing out any bubbles with the squeegee and wiping the screen with the microfiber cleaner. The Anti-reflecting Film will provide enhanced visibility and protection against dust and fingerprint smudges ü§© Q: Is the Anti-reflecting Film scratch-resistant? A: The Anti-reflecting Film is coated with both an anti-scratch layer and a dust-resistant coating to help maintain clarity and durability over time. It‚Äôs designed to resist everyday wear and keep your screen looking clean and sharp. Q: Why does a line appear in the center of the screen after applying the Anti-reflecting Film? A: A line may appear in the center of the screen after applying the Anti-reflecting Film. The line typically fades over time and may be reduced by gently wiping the area with a microfiber cleaner. #GalaxyAI #GalaxyS25 FE #Samsung
